data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Thubana Walker (Lepidoptera, Lecithoceridae) from China, with description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Linlin, Zhu, Yanmei, Li, Houhun (2010): Review of the genus Thubana Walker (Lepidoptera, Lecithoceridae) from China, with description of one new species. ZooKeys 53: 33-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.53.412, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.53.412
